alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 3:27AM EST until March 04 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Wyoming, Lackawanna, Luzerne, Pike and Southern Wayne counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM Friday to 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snowfall rates of an inch per hour possible Friday evening prior to snow changing to sleet, sleet accumulations may approach 1 inch outside the Wyoming Valley.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorist to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadways, and traffic conditions.

area.areaDesc: Lackawanna; Luzerne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Wyoming
